name: clothing-loop-docker-scripts
description: Docker Scripts for the Clothing Loop

scripts.dev:frontend:start: docker compose exec frontend sh -c 'npm i; npm run start:lan'
scripts.dev:app:start: docker compose exec app sh -c 'npm i; npm run dev'
scripts.dev:server:start: docker compose exec server sh -c 'go run cmd/server/main.go'
